name: The Last Planet
overview: This could be the last time Nick wrecks another interstellar missile cruiser on some backwoods planet. Unless you can help him. This is going to take skill, brains, guts, and brazen foolhardiness to recapture the ship, repair it and skip this strange excuse for a mysterious alien world. Part of "Commodore Pro-Pak" game pack / 1st part of "Nick Hardy Adventures" trilogy.
